query:
SELECT p.id, p.name, COUNT(c.id) as num_obras
FROM projects p
LEFT JOIN constructions c ON c.projectId = p.id
WHERE p.name LIKE '%MYRIAD%'
GROUP BY p.id, p.name;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2v15PjphCS6k4yi.a0fb40a33af2 --database jpou84ZRnGWoiZm2uo5tdU --execute SELECT p.id, p.name, COUNT(c.id) as num_obras
FROM projects p
